name: dictation-ai
title: Dictation AI
description: Convert speech to text using OpenAI Whisper and format with OpenRouter models
author: inakitajes

commands.name: dictate
commands.title: Dictate
commands.description: Start recording immediately and auto-transcribe when stopped

preferences.name: openaiApiKey
preferences.title: OpenAI API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API key for speech transcription

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: Transcription Model
preferences.description: OpenAI model for speech transcription (e.g., whisper-1, gpt-4o-transcribe)

preferences.name: formattingModel
preferences.title: Formatting Model
preferences.description: OpenAI model for text formatting (e.g., gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-3.5-turbo)

preferences.name: baseURL
preferences.title: Base URL
preferences.description: OpenAI-compatible API base URL for both transcription and formatting

preferences.name: language
preferences.title: Language
preferences.description: Language for transcription (auto-detect if not specified)

preferences.name: pasteBehavior
preferences.title: Paste Behavior
preferences.description: What to do with formatted text after transcription

preferences.name: promptFile
preferences.title: Custom Transcription Context File
preferences.description: File with context to improve speech recognition accuracy (names, technical terms, abbreviations)

preferences.name: temperature
preferences.title: Temperature
preferences.description: Sampling temperature for more creative or conservative transcription

preferences.name: customPromptEmailFile
preferences.title: Custom Email Prompt File
preferences.description: File containing custom email prompt (leave empty to use default)

preferences.name: customPromptSlackFile
preferences.title: Custom Slack Prompt File
preferences.description: File containing custom Slack prompt (leave empty to use default)

preferences.name: customPromptReportFile
preferences.title: Custom Report Prompt File
preferences.description: File containing custom report prompt (leave empty to use default)

preferences.name: customPromptTaskFile
preferences.title: Custom Task Prompt File
preferences.description: File containing custom task prompt (leave empty to use default)

preferences.name: customPromptTranslateFile
preferences.title: Custom Translation Prompt File
preferences.description: File containing custom translation prompt (leave empty to use default)
